__e: From what I understand, Marcel is still single.
Of course not, but Marcel is so sensitive.
You and Marcel and Davina. And, yeah, I'd die for you. Because I don't think I can go back to how it was before.
I thought Marcel and I had a thing, but that didn't work out.
Why don't you just tell me where Marcel is and we can both get on with our day, huh?
That and I believe Marcel has found a way of controlling them.
This town was my home once, and in my absence, Marcel has gotten everything that I ever wanted.
From what I hear, he tortured his friend Marcel, cursed the mother of his child, and burned your paramour in front of you, all because he thought it the logical way to defeat his enemy.
